Murat Kezer

              Murat Kezer
            
            
              
                
                    
                      
                        
                    
                  
                                    
                    
                      
                        
                    
                  
                                    
                    
                      
                        
                    
                  
                                    
                    
                      
                        
                    
                  
                                  
            
          
        
        
        
          
            
            About
            I am a doctoral researcher at the University of Oregon,
            studying empathy, interpersonal perception, and social
            media. With a strong passion for data science, I integrate
            machine learning and NLP models into my projects. I enjoy
            teaching statistics and bringing interdisciplinary
            approaches to both my researcg and the classroom.
            
            
            Education
            University of Oregon | Eugene, OR
            Ph.D. in Psychology | September 2019 - June 2025
            Koc University | Istanbul, Turkey
            M.A. in Psychology | September 2015 - June 2018
            Bogazici University | Istanbul,
            Turkey
            B.A. in Guidance and Psychological Counseling | September
            2010 - June 2015
            
            
            Experience
            University of Oregon | Graduate Employee
            | September 2019 - Present
            Koc University | Research and Teaching
            Assistant | September 2015 - September 2019
            
          
        
      
    

    
      
        
          
            
              
            
              Murat Kezer
